QuestData.Title: Venomblood Antidote
QuestData.Description: Iset attempted to defend this holy ground when the Wastewander bandits ransacked it.$B$BThey appear to have used the potent toxin present in the venomblood scorpids.$B$BTake this vial and collect venom from their corpses so that I may concoct an antidote. I fear Iset might not have much time.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fill the Antidote Vial with the poison of 8 Venomblood Scorpid corpses.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. We might yet save Iset.
